title: COAST / MORELL barks whirling
description: Morel says this stuff in Whirling.

dialogueTree.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""It's a bit crowded in here.""
Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""The evidence is right there -- we..."
dialogueTree.text: "The evidence is right there -- we can't just ignore it."

dialogueTree.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""There was a confirmed sighting in..."
dialogueTree.text: "There was a confirmed sighting in Mirova in December."

dialogueTree.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""Hate to break it to you, Gary, but..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hate to break it to you, Gary, but rhinos don't just combust in flames."

dialogueTree.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""An *unconfirmed* sighting is just..."
Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""Are you enjoying yourself, darling?""
Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""C'mon, Gary, it's never that black..."
dialogueTree.text: "C'mon, Gary, it's never that black and white."

dialogueTree.title: Morell, the Cryptozoologist: ""God, I hope the traps will hold...""
dialogueTree.text: "God, I hope the traps will hold..."
